description: Brenner Bolton says he’s not gay but once his new farm-boy, Luke Adams, divulges his love for cock it does not seem to matter. There is nothing that is going to get in the way of having Luke ram his tight, hairy hole on the bed of his pick-up truck. Brenner’s wish comes true as he gets railed hard and fast just like he likes it. He even utilizes the skills he learned on the farm as he takes the reigns and rides Luke’s raging hard cock.
title: Down Low Part 2
